item.title: A Comprehensive Guide to FluentValidation: Advancing Your .NET Validation Logic
item.description:
In our rapidly evolving digital era, ensuring the accuracy and consistency of our application's data is paramount. With the sheer complexity of modern applications, ensuring every piece of data is validated correctly is a challenge. Enter FluentValidation, an exceptional tool designed for .NET developers.

PostgreSQL Load Balancing Made Easy: A Deep Dive into pgpool - Highgo Software Inc.
item.description: Introduction This blog is aimed at beginners trying to learn the basics of PostgreSQL and PGPool but already have some experience under their belt. For this tutorial, we will assume you have PostgreSQL correctly installed on Ubuntu. All of these steps were done using PostgreSQL 16 (development version) and PGPool 4.4.3 on Ubuntu 23.04.
